title: How to Support & Learn from the Black Community. Feat. Dani Coke
description:
Happy Tuesday everyone! 

Today's episode is a very important one. With the help of Danielle Coke, a Black woman, we will be speaking about the injustice towards the Black community and everything that we learned in 2020. Dani will be sharing her perspective, experiences, and hopes for the Black community and the future. This space is a safe environment where learning is encouraged.


Don't forget to check us out on social media! 

Dani's Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ohhappydani/

Jeanine's Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/jeanineamapola/ 

Happy and Healthy's Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/HappyandHealthyPodcast/ 


Watch this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/8WCKeXwgsVM


You can also listen to the audio form on Spotify, Apple Podcast, Google Podcast, Overcast, Anchor, Breaker, Pocket Casts, and Radio Public.

--- Send in a voice message: https://anchor.fm/happyandhealthy/message Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/happyandhealthy/support
